StringTable.Label: Quest_AppointGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: We've identified at least one planet we've colonized large enough to warrant a [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS]. A [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS] turns any simple colony into a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS], allowing us to build a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] and Planetary Improvements to increase the Planet's Output.[BR][BR]A [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] can be appointed as [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS] of any colonized planet with a [HS=HS_PlanetClass]Planet Class[/HS] of 10 or greater. The colonized planet will become a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS], which can be improved and expanded on to improve its contributions to the civilization greatly.[BR][BR]A [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader's[/HS] traits and stats can have drastic effects on the world they're assigned and its citizens. Some care should be taken in what [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] is appointed as [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS].[BR][BR][I]Appoint a [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS] to a planet either by selecting the planet and hitting the [ICON=Menu_PlanetManagement_Icon] Planet Management button or through the [ICON=Menu_Leader_Icon] [HS=HS_LeaderMenu]Leaders Menu[/HS].[/I]

StringTable.Label: Quest_AppointGovernor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Turn any colonized planet with a [HS=HS_PlanetClass]Planet Class[/HS] of 10 or greater into a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS] by appointing a [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS]. Any hired [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] can be appointed as governor, but the stats and traits of a [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] can significantly affect the colony they oversee.[BR][BR][I]Appoint a [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS] to a planet either by selecting the planet and hitting the [ICON=Menu_PlanetManagement_Icon] Planet Management button or through the [ICON=Menu_Leader_Icon] [HS=HS_LeaderMenu]Leaders Menu[/HS].[/I]

StringTable.Label: Quest_AppointGovernor_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We will find a leader to fill the position.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AppointGovernor_Choice_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a mission to appoint a governor

Any hired [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] can be appointed as governor, but the stats and traits of a [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] can significantly affect the colony they oversee.[BR][BR][I]Appoint a [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS] to a planet either by selecting the planet and hitting the [ICON=Menu_PlanetManagement_Icon] Planet Management button or through the [ICON=Menu_Leader_Icon] [HS=HS_LeaderMenu]Leaders Menu[/HS].[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] +10% [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 10 Turns, +5 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_AppointGovernor_End_Dec
StringTable.String: A [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS] has been assigned, establishing new [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]. Now, the colony can be expanded with improvements, new citizens generated, and we can even build a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS].
